mapper.select: select t.* from l_blanklist t LEFT JOIN l_individual li on li.individualid=t.refid where t.blanklisttype=1 and spstate=1 and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and li.idcard=#{idcard}
select t.* from l_blanklist t LEFT JOIN l_trader lt on lt.traderid=t.refid where t.blanklisttype=2 and spstate=1 and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and lt.tradername=#{tradername}
